page.title: 06Marton Artists.
page.content: On the 25 May the Marton Artists' Exhibition opened.It took place in Marton House.Artists exhibited their works in studios and garages.There were about 300 paintings and many crafts including pottery,hand and turned wood and needlecrafts.The paintings varied in styles and textures,some were very modern but most were of a traditional style painted in oils and watercolour.Marton Artists was originally started as a means for local artists & craftsmen to exhibit and sell their wares.The work is accepted from within a 10 mile radius.The committee charges 10% for items sold.The money raised is donated to local charities.
